data.name: FRIGID VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
A single-player game that throws players into a battle for survival after a cataclysmic event. Climate researchers studying the contamination of arctic glaciers have found something disturbing in the area.



Play as a retired hunter going on winter vacation
Experience an ultra-realistic beautiful wildlife arctic environment.
Figure out how to survive this unforgiving survival situation and maybe you can piece together what is happening.



Survive deadly wildlife, find hope in survivors, scavenge anything you can find to tip the odds into your favor. Travel three distinct vast locations and do whatever it takes to ultimately survive.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Notes.gif


FEATURES

SURVIVAL EXPLORATION
SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
INTRIGUING STORY
Real-life weapon handling
Atmospheric Graphics
Natural Dangerous Wildlife
Rotate and inspect objects using Oculus Touch or VIVE™ motion controllers
